name: repository-name
description: My personal template for working with webpack
author: Javier Picallo Ortega <javypicallo@gmail.com> (https://github.com/javgiu)

scripts.installations: npm install --save-dev webpack webpack-cli html-webpack-plugin style-loader css-loader html-loader webpack-dev-server webpack-merge
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit' || echo 'No changes to commit' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && git checkout main
